pullrequest.title: Change cmake project name to sdformat8, export cmake targets

content.raw:
It looks like `colcon` can now correctly find the dependencies:

    # colcon list -g
    OGRE                 +*..........
    ignition-cmake2       +***.******
    ignition-math6         +*****.***
    ignition-common3        +  ** *.*
    ignition-msgs3           +   ** .
    sdformat8                 +    **
    ignition-plugin1           +  ***
    ignition-rendering1         + * .
    ignition-transport6          +* *
    ignition-gui1                 + *
    ignition-physics1              +*
    ignition-gazebo                 +
content.html:
It looks like colcon can now correctly find the dependencies:

# colcon list -g
OGRE                 +*..........
ignition-cmake2       +***.******
ignition-math6         +*****.***
ignition-common3        +  ** *.*
ignition-msgs3           +   ** .
sdformat8                 +    **
ignition-plugin1           +  ***
ignition-rendering1         + * .
ignition-transport6          +* *
ignition-gui1                 + *
ignition-physics1              +*
ignition-gazebo                 +
